attributes.additional_details: Captain Tom Moore has served on the front line and now at 99  he is still serving our country by helping those working on the front line to beat Covid-19.
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore needs to be knighted... he has raised over £7 million pounds for the NHS by walking 100 lengths of his garden before his 100th Birthday on the 30th of April.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
